Title: Cookie-setting is not restricted based on the public suffix list
Description: Responses from domain names whose public domain name suffix contains 1 or more periods (e.g. responses from `example.co.uk`, given its public domain name suffix is `co.uk`) are able to set cookies that are included in requests to any other domain sharing the same domain name suffix.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 1.8.2, all versions starting from 2.0.0 before 2.6.0
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 1.8.2 before 2.0.0, all versions starting from 2.6.0
